column5: One of my favorite things to do after a good day of fishing is having a couple cold ones sitting around a campfire. I fish in the Upsala area and the long range forecast looks fairly warm and dry. So what do you think happens first, ice out or burning bans. Not as much fun drinking beer around the old Coleman lantern.
I'll give you, not as much fun around a Coleman lantern, but more fun than sitting at the kitchen table. Even if the beer is good. Bill
Hopefully the spring rains will come. I fished a lake north of Upsala once. The lake was Hogarth. Ever fished it? I remember it was a rough logging road into the lake. Caught walleye but nothing big.
